name: Finger Twister
description:
Novation Launchpad required.

One player creates invisible platforms using the Launchpad, while the other player collects all the "coins" before proceeding to the end of the level.

Memes included.

Assets used:

- Level Selection System: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/gui/level-selection-system-18849

- Poly Toolkit: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/templates/systems/poly-toolkit-104464 (plus assets downloaded from Google Poly)

- Windridge City: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/environments/roadways/windridge-city-13... - Only used for mountains and skybox

- Casual game SFX Pack: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/audio/sound-fx/free-casual-game-sfx-pack-5...

- Chattering Teeth: https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/3d/props/chattering-teeth-21589 (why)

- 16x16 Dungeon Tileset: https://0x72.itch.io/dungeontileset-ii (literally only used the coin sprite)

- Wildcard: launchpad.net (https://github.com/IntelOrca/launchpad)

Assets drafted but not used:

- NVIDIA FleX (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/nvidia-flex-for-unity-1-0-be...), crashed and destroyed the project folder...

- Chain2D (https://assetstore.unity.com/packages/tools/physics/chain2d-58558), had no use for it
